snippet: The activist hedge fund manager Daniel S. Loeb has raised his bet on Sony, as he continues his campaign to persuade the embattled Japanese giant into spinning off part of its entertainment arm.

headline.main: Loeb's Third Point Raises Stake in Sony and Presses Split-Off Plan
